alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Logan; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:26PM CDT until April 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR LOGAN...SOUTHERN JOHNSON...NORTHWESTERN YELL AND SOUTHWESTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 425 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Scranton to near Mount Magazine to near Magazine, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Clarksville... Booneville... Paris... Dardanelle... Lamar... Dover... London... Magazine... Knoxville... Subiaco... Scranton... Blue Mountain... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Broomfield... Mt Nebo State Park... Mount Magazine... Lake Dardanelle... Midway in Logan County... Spadra... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock.
